description:
Terry is a 27 year old stud who has just gotten back to the states from active duty in the Marines overseas. He is extremely handsome, and has an incredibly toned, ripped physique.
He said he loves being naked and has no problem showing his 'stuff' in public, so we decided to take advantage of this fact and invited him to become a Next Door Male.
Once he dropped his pants, we were pleased to see how perfect every inch of him actually is. He turned our female staff members on so much, we knew how much you all would like him too. So with that, we present Terry, our former Marine, in action, by himself, having some solo fun in the kitchen, shower, and in the bedroom.
Enjoy.
title: Terry
